content:
#24303. This PR lets us tag [reassoc] lemmas that are about isomorphisms, and use reassoc_of%for isomorphisms.
This feature requested by @Joël Riou is still awaiting a (meta) reviewer. Assigned reviewer preferred leaving review to someone else. The code is mostly a copy-paste-with-slight-modifications of the original reassoc attribute code.

@Kim Morrison can you maybe have a look at this? Given that you wrote reassoc (as well as being both a tactics and category theory maintainer) you’re probably the best suited to review this?
Happy to have you assign it to me.
